name: SolBox
description: SolBox is a next-gen decentralized cloud storage platform built on Solana. With client-side AES-256 encryption, it shards files into multiple encrypted pieces that are distributed across a global node network for maximum redundancy and privacy. Immutable on-chain references and automated smart contracts guarantee censorship-resistance, tamper-proof storage, and verifiable access control. True data ownership means you—and only you—control the encryption keys and permissions, ensuring your files stay private, secure, and fully under your authority.
